articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Re 
SBF: 1) I still do not have access to much of my data -- professional or personal.  So there is a limit to what I will be able to say, and I won't be as helpful as I'd like.
But as the committee still thinks it would be useful, I am willing to testify on the 13th.
 https://twitter.com/RepMaxineWaters/status/1599858166359068676
articles.title: Re

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description: SBF says he is willing to testify on the 13th...
articles.title: SBF says he is willing to testify on the 13th...

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
.@renprotocol plans to wind down 1.0 version and calls for holders of Ren assets to bridge back to native chains ASAP.
Ren: 1) Important notice ⚠️
As announced previously, the Ren 1.0 network is shutting down due to the events surrounding Alameda
As compatibility between Ren 1.0 and 2.0 cannot be guaranteed, holders of Ren assets should bridge back to native chains ASAP, or risk losing them!
 https://twitter.com/renprotocol/status/1594305211115663360
articles.title: .@renprotocol plans to wind down 1.0 version and calls for holders of Ren assets to bridge back to native chains ASAP.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Senate Banking Committee orders SBF to testify in-person at Dec. 13th hearing, with a subpoena “on the table.”
Maxine Waters: Lies are circulating @CNBC that I am not willing to subpoena @SBF_FTX. He has been requested to testify at the December 13th hearing. A subpoena is definitely on the table. Stay tuned.
articles.title: Senate Banking Committee orders SBF to testify in-person at Dec. 13th hearing, with a subpoena “on the table.”
